member.name: MFCONTENTPROTECTIONDEVICE_REALTIMECLIENT_DATA
member.summary: Advises the secure processor of the Multimedia Class Scheduler service (MMCSS) parameters so that real-time tasks can be scheduled at the expected priority.

member.name: MFCONTENTPROTECTIONDEVICE_REALTIMECLIENT_DATA.TaskIndex
member.summary: The identifier for the MMCSS task.

member.name: MFCONTENTPROTECTIONDEVICE_REALTIMECLIENT_DATA.ClassName
member.summary: The name of the MMCSS task.

member.name: MFCONTENTPROTECTIONDEVICE_REALTIMECLIENT_DATA.BasePriority
member.summary: The base priority of the thread that runs the MMCSS task.
